#Reworked tradenodes for Petrus - should work hopefully :oooo

english_channel={
	location=1269
	color={ 220 138 57 }
	members={
		234 235 236 237 238 1860 87 88 90 92 95 96 97 98 99 100 1744 1865 1879 89 167 168 1269 4370 3028 4371 4374 4382 3058 4381 3060 3061 4383 3064 3065 3073 4385 3110 3063 
		#PetrusAdd
		1742 2974 3057 3059 3062 3067 3076 3080 3091
	
	} #38 provinces 
	end=yes
}

lubeck={
	location=45
	color={ 190 70 70 }
	outgoing={
		name="english_channel"
		path={ 1857 44 1268 1269 }
		control={ 2799.000000 1908.000000 2791.000000 1910.000000 2786.000000 1910.000000 2780.000000 1916.000000 2767.000000 1918.000000 2741.000000 1915.000000 2729.000000 1908.000000 2720.000000 1905.000000 2713.000000 1899.000000 }
	}
	members={
		6 12 13 14 15 16 17 26 44 45 46 47 53 54 55 1775 1857 1874 48 49 1858 1982 1981 1983 1984 7 1931 2971 2993 2994 2995 2996 3134 3135 3217 3120 4165 4166 4163 4164 4143 4144 4145 4142 4149 4141 1758 22 3117
	#PetrusAdd
	3093
	} #47 provinces
}

champagne={
	location=183
	color={ 193 26 14 }
	inland=yes
	#Reversing flow in BT 10.0. Formerly, Champagne flowed to Genoa, but now Genoa flows to Champagne, making the English Channel the only end node. Many complex arguments involved here, but we're giving this a a try for now. 
	outgoing={
		name="english_channel"
		path={ 89 88 3065 90 1269 }
		control={ 2666.000000 1829.000000 2667.000000 1837.000000 2672.000000 1841.000000 2676.000000 1843.000000 2683.000000 1850.000000 2685.000000 1858.000000 2688.000000 1864.000000 2688.000000 1871.000000 2695.000000 1881.000000 }
	}
	members={
		91 177 178 179 181 182 183 184 185 186 187 188 189 190 191 192 193 199 1743 1866 1877 3069 3070 3071 4388 3075 4389 3088 4392 3092 4390 195 3087 3109 
		#PetrusAdd
		93 3078 3086 3035 3029 3031 3033 3066
	
	} #34 provinces 
	#Removing Champagne as an end node. I hate to break with HR here, but with the changes I made to Africa there was no possible Ivory Coast to English Channel route that did not detour to North America. Now it can flow Ivory Coast to Safi to Bordeaux to Champagne to English Channel.
}

rheinland={
	location=1876
	color={ 114 171 184 }
	inland=yes
	outgoing={
		name="champagne"
		path={ 78 80 94 188 189 187 3071 186 183 }
		control={ 2762.000000 1838.000000 2751.000000 1836.000000 2739.000000 1837.000000 2735.000000 1832.000000 2733.000000 1830.000000 2733.000000 1826.000000 2730.000000 1823.000000 2731.000000 1819.000000 2726.000000 1815.000000 2720.000000 1812.000000 2713.000000 1815.000000 2708.000000 1817.000000 2702.000000 1823.000000 2691.000000 1824.000000 2687.000000 1822.000000 2681.000000 1823.000000 2673.000000 1819.000000 2669.000000 1822.000000 }
	}
	outgoing={
		name="lubeck"
		path={ 83 3201 3200 3292 86 56 2971 1874 54 44 1857 45 }

	}
	outgoing={
		name="english_channel"
		path={ 83 1760 85 2975 3060 4383 1269 }
		control={ 2760.000000 1842.000000 2756.000000 1845.000000 2755.000000 1849.000000 2751.000000 1851.000000 2749.000000 1854.000000 2745.000000 1857.000000 2744.000000 1862.000000 2741.000000 1866.000000 2738.000000 1873.000000 2730.000000 1878.000000 2719.000000 1878.000000 2712.000000 1876.000000 2706.000000 1874.000000 2701.000000 1876.000000 2697.000000 1881.000000 2697.000000 1887.000000 }
	}
	members={
		56 70 72 74 75 77 78 79 80 81 82 83 84 85 86 94 165 166 1760 1761 1762 1869 1870 1876 1878 1880 2972 2973 2975 3055 3197 3198 3199 3200 3201 3202 3203 3204 3205 3206 3207 3208 3209 3210 3292 1873 1867 1871 3056

	}	#43 provinces
}
